title: 请问客户端进不去服务器怎么办？登录失败，请重启游戏
author: 剑九六千里
txt_content:
首先打开：server.properties
打开软件：Notepad++
提示：注意转码~~~~
感谢，是我自己开的小服，今天刚学会的~~~~

replies.author: 剑九六千里
replies.txt_content:
标题: 请问客户端进不去服务器怎么办？登录失败，请重启游戏提示登录失败，请尝试重启游戏！！！！！！怎么办呀！！！！
重启了也不行！

replies.author: ESCesc
replies.txt_content:
首先打开：server.properties
打开软件：Notepad++
提示：注意转码~~~~

#Minecraft server properties
#Thu Jan 12 18:36:38 CST 2017
spawn-protection=1
server-name=A Minecraft Server
generator-settings=
force-gamemode=false
allow-nether=true
gamemode=0
broadcast-console-to-ops=true
enable-query=false
player-idle-timeout=0
difficulty=3
spawn-monsters=true
op-permission-level=4
resource-pack-hash=
announce-player-achievements=true
pvp=true
snooper-enabled=true
level-type=DEFAULT
hardcore=false
enable-command-block=true
max-players=33
network-compression-threshold=256
resource-pack-sha1=
max-world-size=29999984
server-port=25565
debug=false
server-ip=0.0.0.0
spawn-npcs=true
allow-flight=false
level-name=world
view-distance=5
server-id=unnamed
hellworld=true
resource-pack=
spawn-animals=true
white-list=false
generate-structures=true
max-build-height=256
online-mode=ture
level-seed=
use-native-transport=true
enable-rcon=false
motd=A Minecraft Server



只需要把ture修改为false就可以解决了，楼主你应该是这个问题，如果是别人的服务器，别人可以进去的话请追问。谢谢


记得采纳~
